name: The Challenge of the Matrix
description:
A puzzle game for Amiga & Amiga emulators. This was my first Amiga game, programmed in assembler and originally released as Public Domain/freeware in September 1991.

The Matrix is a simple game. Use the joystick to move your bubble over the tiles. Walking over them makes them vanish, but walking over the empty spaces causes you to lose energy, so you must find a path that clears the level with the minimum of back-steps. Years later, I re-made a 3D version of this game called Yinyang which was remastered and released on Steam in 2019.

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators, and in RP9 format for use with Cloanto's Amiga Forever and other RetroPlatform emulators.
